mapper.update:
update user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
